alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Peach; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 2:12PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Peach, southern Crawford and northeastern Taylor Counties through 245 PM EST... At 210 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Reynolds, or near Butler, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Reynolds, Nakomis, Powerville, Lee Pope, Horns and Potterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central and west central Georgia.
